Package org.fishwife.jrugged.control

Experimental (and "dark") code exploring robust/resilient software designs, control theory, and Mars rovers.

See: Description

Package org.fishwife.jrugged.control Description

Experimental (and "dark") code exploring robust/resilient software designs, control theory, and Mars rovers.

References:

  • Wikipedia article on Control Theory.
  • Rasmussen, Robert D. "GN&C Fault Protection Fundamentals." In 31st Annual AAS Guidance and Control Conference, February 2008.
